bundles.name: Dry & Dehydrated Skin Routine
bundles.description: The Dry & Dehydrated Skin Routine is designed for skin that feels tight, uncomfortable, or lacks moisture. This routine focuses on supporting hydration and helping maintain the skin’s natural moisture balance, leaving the skin feeling soft, smooth, and comfortable throughout the day.

bundles.name: Combination Skin Balance Routine
bundles.description: The Combination Skin Balance Routine is designed for skin that is oily in some areas and dry in others. This routine helps support hydration where needed while keeping oil-prone areas feeling balanced and comfortable, resulting in a more even-looking complexion.
products: Sun Protection SPF50 Stick, no tint

bundles.name: Simple Daily Skincare Routine
bundles.description: The Simple Daily Skincare Routine is designed for those who prefer an easy, no-fuss approach to skincare. This routine focuses on daily care essentials to help keep the skin feeling clean, comfortable, and well cared for without unnecessary steps.
products: Sun Protection SPF50 Stick, no tint

bundles.name: Sensitive & Reactive Skin Routine
bundles.description: Sensitive & Reactive Skin Routine is designed for skin that is easily irritated, reactive, or prone to redness. This gentle routine focuses on supporting the skin barrier and maintaining comfort, helping the skin feel calm, balanced, and well cared for without the use of harsh or aggressive ingredients.

bundles.name: Normal & Balanced Skin Routine
bundles.description: The Normal & Balanced Skin Routine is designed for skin that feels comfortable and well balanced, without specific concerns. This routine helps maintain the skin’s natural balance and supports a fresh, healthy-looking complexion with a simple and effective daily approach.
products: Sun Protection SPF50 Stick, no tint

bundles.name: Glow & Radiance Routine
bundles.description: The Glow & Radiance Routine is designed for skin that looks dull or uneven. This routine focuses on supporting a fresher, more radiant-looking complexion while keeping the skin hydrated and comfortable as part of a consistent daily routine.
products: Sun Protection SPF50 Stick, no tint

bundles.name: Firm & Smooth Skin Routine
bundles.description: The Firm & Smooth Skin Routine is designed for skin showing early signs of aging, such as fine lines or loss of firmness. This routine focuses on supporting a smoother-looking complexion and maintaining skin comfort as part of a consistent daily skincare routine.

bundles.name: Clear & Balanced Skin Routine
bundles.description: The Clear & Balanced Skin Routine is designed for oily or blemish-prone skin that is prone to breakouts or excess shine. This routine focuses on helping maintain a balanced-looking complexion while keeping the skin feeling fresh, lightweight, and comfortable without over-drying.
products: Sun Protection SPF50 Stick, no tint
